question: Which Indian cueist won the title at the Senior National Billiards Championship, which was his career's 33rd National title?
explanation:
World-class Indian cueist and 23-time world champion Pankaj Advani has recently clinched his 33rd National title by winning the title at the Senior National Billiards Championship.
In the tournament held at Pune, Pankaj defeated his fellow cueist Sourav Kothari 5-2 in the finals. In the semi-final held earlier, Pankaj dominated with a 5-0 victory over Dhvaj Haria of Gujarat. This is not only the 33rd national title of Pankaj Advani, but this is also his 10th senior title. He will also participate in the national snooker championship, which is scheduled in the same venue from February 3.
